tweet: While we should always honor the sacrifices of our veterans, today in particular is set aside for remembering those who served in Vietnam. #VietnamWar veterans received lapel pins during a ceremony today at the #Minot AFB Exchange. #VietnamWarVeteransDay #NDveterans pic.twitter.com/UHIjJWvk9b

At our @EnergyGOP hearing, @Interior Sec. nominee David Bernhardt committed to work w/ me to secure additional law enforcement in Indian Country. Specifically, I’m advocating for a new BIA law enforcement training center in #NorthDakota. https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-secures-commitment-from-interior-secretary-nominee-to-address-law-enforcement-shortage-in-indian-country …

Transporting livestock isn’t like transporting other goods, & added challenges that come w/ it require flexibility. I appreciate @SecElaineChao’s commitment to work w/ me on my bipartisan bill to reform Hours of Service & Electronic Logging Device regulations. pic.twitter.com/h4JxJOb0in

Nationally, our public water entities deliver 1 ton of on demand water per household per day. That’s pretty impressive. I met w/ water works professionals this afternoon from #Bismarck & #GrandForks who discussed their work w/ me. pic.twitter.com/rwvs32lbuo

At our Defense Approps Committee a couple weeks ago, I underscored the importance of modernizing our nuclear triad to USAF Chief of Staff Gen. David Goldfein. We met today to follow-up on our conversation & also to discuss the future of Air Force #UAS & counter-UAS technology. pic.twitter.com/ayHx6F16rG

Congrats to the @MinotState Beavers for winning the school’s 2nd ACHA DI Natl. Championship – a great achievement made possible because of the hard work & dedication of the players and coaches. https://twitter.com/MinotState/status/1110771910911164417 …

I enjoyed visiting with #NorthDakota students this afternoon while they’re in town for @CloseUp_DC. While here, they’re gaining an inside look at our federal government & developing the skills & knowledge to be the next generation of informed, engaged citizens. pic.twitter.com/36u92UF3Dj

With rising temps & spring runoff, we’re working w/ Army Corps to ensure preventing further flooding & to advance comprehensive #floodprotection projects like in the RRV & #Minot. I spoke w/ Col. John Hudson & met w/ Col. Sam Calkins today about the issues. https://bit.ly/2FEQJcK
Spoke with @LizMacDonaldFox on the @EveningEdit tonight after voting against the costly and unrealistic #GreenNewDeal. pic.twitter.com/wsLRPez33z

Career & technical education prepare students for jobs in fields where we are seeing an increasing demand for new workers. I met w/ #NorthDakota ACTE Exec. Director Rick Ross about his work to help develop our state’s workforce by promoting career & tech. education. pic.twitter.com/45n0fyWhCM

I met w/ folks from @AIPAC in DC for #AIPAC2019 about supporting Israel, our closest ally in the Middle East, particularly as they deal w/ threats like recent rocket attacks from Gaza. pic.twitter.com/DLmg3nBZTH

The Garrison Dam plays an important role in controlling flooding along the Missouri River & in generating electric power for thousands of customers. @WesternAreaPowr markets & transmits that energy & I met w/ Admin & CEO @MarkAGabriel & his team who updated me on their work. pic.twitter.com/F6RGL1DPIN

AG Barr released a summary of the Special Counsel’s report. As I’ve said throughout this process, we need to get the facts. The Special Counsel worked to do that & found there was no collusion between the President & Russia. My full statement ↓ https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-statement-after-mueller-investigation-finds-no-collusion …

We need more young people in #agriculture & it’s good to hear about individuals like Cooper & Clint Coleman, currently enrolled at @NDSU, who are planning to take over their family farm & ranch north of #Bismarck. https://twitter.com/KFYRTV/status/1110003197442166785 …

Throughout this year, the @NDSUmbb team has repeatedly risen to meet challenges it has faced. Landon Solberg, an 11-year-old cancer patient, has been a source of inspiration. We’ll be cheering w/ him & all of Bison Nation tonight. #GoBison #LandonsLight https://www.valleynewslive.com/content/news/Bison-BB-Coach-putting-national-spotlight-on-young-boy-battling-brain-cancer-507513131.html …

This week in ND, we marked return of ROTC flight program at @UofNorthDakota. Officials in #Fargo signed a new PPA to advance flood protection. I held a @IndianCommittee hearing & #agriculture roundtable in #Bismarck. Then in #Minot, I outlined efforts to secure flood protection. pic.twitter.com/O0wQAJUYLL

After our flood protection roundtable in #Minot, we toured ongoing construction of the first 3 phases of the project. We’re working to secure approval to advance the project’s 4th phase & to develop phase 5. pic.twitter.com/989bIc0zFY

Spring thaw is a reminder of how important flood protection is for the #Minot region. We’re working to secure approval of the Chief’s report to advance the project’s 4th phase while also working w/ local leaders to develop phase 5. https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-advancing-flood-protection-for-minot-region …

I’m heading to #Minot this afternoon to hold a roundtable to outline our ongoing efforts to secure permanent flood protection for the region. Specifically, we’re working to secure approval of the Chief’s report to advance phase 4 & to develop phase 5 of the project.
.@WorldDSDay falls on March 21st to symbolize the triplication of their 21st chromosomes. #WDSD19 #WorldDownSyndromeDay pic.twitter.com/zhq2RwogGe

Our #farmers & #ranchers are the best in the world, & when given a level playing field, can compete in any market. That’s why we’re working to secure better trade deals for our producers, many of whom I met with today at our roundtable in #Bismarck. https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-holds-trade-roundtable-with-north-dakota-agriculture-groups2019 …
Congrats, great game. #GoBison https://twitter.com/marchmadness/status/1108529926007934977 …
Good luck to #NDSUmbb tonight in your First Four game against NC Central. We’ll be rooting. #GoBison

One of my top priorities as Chairman of the Senate @IndianCommittee has been to address public safety in Indian communities. That’s why today I convened a field oversight hearing at @UnitedTribesND on building safe tribal communities. pic.twitter.com/CGTFQHNCsU

Natl. Medal of Honor Day is Monday. In anticipation, folks in #Minot honored the 19 Medal of Honor recipients named at the memorial in Roosevelt Park. We commemorate all who have served, especially those who have done so w/ remarkable distinction. pic.twitter.com/X0iTEJ8TyT

We’re working to advance comprehensive #floodprotection & today took an important step w/ signing of new PPA. https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-signing-of-ppa-at-750-million-new-p3-account-in-budget-advance-red-river-valley-flood-protection-implementation-of-plan-b2019 …

BIG NEWS: the Army Corps & state & local leaders signed a renegotiated PPA. This, along w/ inclusion of P3s in President’s budget in line w/ legislation I passed, means we’re continuing to move forward comprehensive #floodprotection in the Red River Valley. pic.twitter.com/S0Zpf0TMce

In addition, the President’s budget last week included a new account for public-private partnerships (P3s) as a result of legislation I passed last year. This new P3 account & renegotiated PPA are great progress for comprehensive flood protection in RRV. (2/2)

I’m heading to #Fargo for the signing of the new Project Partnership Agreement (PPA) for comprehensive #floodprotection in the Red River Valley. I worked to advance the renegotiated PPA which includes increased federal funding for this important project. (1/2)

Great event this morning at @UofNorthDakota where we marked the return of the Army Flight Training program. This program will help train ROTC cadets to fly & will serve an important part in addressing pilot shortages. pic.twitter.com/Reting06YJ

We’ve passed legislation to help address our nation-wide shortage of pilots. This includes helping the Army train ROTC cadets to fly at flight training schools like @UofNorthDakota, where we re-launched a flight training program today. https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-secured-funds-to-restart-unds-army-rotc-cadet-flight-training-program2019 …

Every year, the @FargoTheatre hosts the @FargoFilmFest, showcasing the works of students, amateurs & professional filmmakers from across the country & around the world. Best wishes for a successful festival & safe travels to all traveling to #Fargo for the event.

I’m heading up to the @UofNorthDakota this morning to mark the return of the ROTC helicopter flight training program. I passed legislation to allow the @USArmy to again use flight schools like @UNDAerospace to train ROTC pilots & help address our nation’s shortage of pilots.
This month, we celebrate women’s influence in shaping our nation’s history & moving our country forward. #WomensHistoryMonth pic.twitter.com/OuEQuF548X

Congratulations to the #Bismarck Veterans Memorial Public Library on being named a finalist for the 2019 National Medal for Museum & Library Service. This nomination reflects the library’s innovative & demonstrated commitment to the Bismarck community. #IMLSmedals pic.twitter.com/jPdUFB7nCb

Mikey & I send our deepest sympathies to the people of New Zealand during this difficult time. This is a terrible tragedy, with the attack targeting people in their places of worship. We must reject hatred & violent extremism in all its forms.

We overviewed the @usairforce’s FY2020 budget at a hearing of our defense appropriations committee. I outlined the need to modernize the nuclear triad, address our nation’s pilot shortage & support vital missions at #Minot and #GrandForks AFBs. My remarks ↓ pic.twitter.com/U0p0xXdJVR

My Carbon Capture Modernization Act will help support the use of CCS tech. We appreciate Reps. Collin Peterson & @RepMcKinley introducing companion legislation in the House to help advance our efforts to make using CCS tech. more economically feasible.
There’s nothing quite like #NorthDakota’s Class B Boys State Basketball Tournament. Best wishes to all attending the events, already underway, in #Minot & good luck to the teams. #NDpreps

Border security is vital to our national security, which is why I voted against the resolution of disapproval for President Trump’s national emergency declaration. My full statement ⬇️ https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-statement-after-voting-against-resolution-of-disapproval-for-presidents-national-emergency …

Happy #NationalAgDay. American #farmers & #ranchers are the best in the world at what they do. Senator @JohnBoozman & I have the privilege to work on @SenateAgGOP on behalf of our #ag producers, & we appreciate all that they do. #NationalAgWeek pic.twitter.com/C1onsIGlWQ

Without a doubt, one of the highlights of the spring is when I get to meet with #NorthDakota students who’ve come to DC to learn more about our nation’s history & federal government. Today, I met with students from Wing, Wilton & #Fargo Davies high schools. pic.twitter.com/pjpZiwgDB2

We’ve been working to address unfair trade practices so that trade agreements will be free & fair while providing our #farmers & #ranchers access to foreign markets. (2/2) https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-meets-with-president-to-advance-usmca-trade-negotiations-with-china …
Had a good meeting w/ @POTUS today to discuss trade, specifically advancing the USMCA & finalizing negotiations w/ China. (1/2)

Best wishes to @NDSUmbb in tonight’s Summit League championship. We’ll be rooting. #GoBison

#NorthDakota postal supervisors stopped by my office today. It’s crucial for mail to reach the intended recipient in a timely manner, regardless of zip code. That’s why in #Fargo, we recently held a roundtable to hear ideas about improving the system & ways to make it work better pic.twitter.com/BrhDqos3rM

#NorthDakota hosts a UAS integration pilot program, a UTM program & a UAS test site for the FAA. I spoke w/ the FAA’s head of UAS integration today about work to integrate #UAS into our national airspace. #NDUAS pic.twitter.com/vc2UiTWqkG
Talked #FarmBill & trade w/ @ndcorn & #NorthDakota Barley today. As chair of Ag Approps & a member of @SenateAgGOP, I always enjoy when our commodity groups stop by. pic.twitter.com/XnRafo8YgL

Yet another study finds that #NorthDakota has some of the happiest cities (#Fargo, no. 6 and #Bismarck, no. 11) in the country. It’s really no surprise though since we have a strong economy & great people. https://wallethub.com/edu/happiest-places-to-live/32619/ …

The President just signed into law our bipartisan #LandsPackage2019 to improve federal & state public lands management. Robocalls are not merely an annoyance, but can be attempts to defraud. That’s why I cosponsored the TRACED Act introduced by @SenJohnThune & @SenMarkey to help deter this illegal activity.

Today kicks off the #NorthDakota Class A Boys & Girls state basketball tournaments at the @BisEventCenter. Best wishes to all participants, families & fans traveling to #Bismarck.

.@senjudiciary today advanced Peter Welte’s nomination to serve as U.S. District Court Judge for #NorthDakota. The committee has now approved both Peter's nomination & Drew Wrigley’s to be U.S. Attorney for ND. We’ll work to move their nominations through full Senate ASAP. #ndpol

We need to secure our border, & we’ve heard from the experts that having a physical barrier is an important part of that effort. Today, @repblumenauer & @RepWalorski introduced in the House the companion bill to my Move America Act. We thank them for joining us in our effort to give states & local govts. flexibility in funding important infrastructure projects. #MoveAmericaAct
